original_text: Yea, thou heardest not; yea, thou knewest not; yea, from that time that thine ear was not opened: for I knew that thou wouldest deal very treacherously, and wast called a transgressor from the womb.
korean_text: 네가 과연 듣지도 못하였고 알지도 못하였으며 네 귀가 옛적부터 열리지 못하였나니 이는 네가 정녕 배신하여 모태에서부터 네가 배역한 자라 불린 줄을 내가 알았음이라

sentences.original_text: from that time that thine ear was not opened
for I knew that thou wouldest deal very treacherously
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 알았기 때문입니다, 당신이 매우 배신적으로 행동할 것을

sentences.original_text: and wast called a transgressor from womb
